statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers WHERE role = 'Customer';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE role IN ('Admin', 'Customer') ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, role FROM customers WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, email, role FROM customers WHERE role IN ('user', 'admin') ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE data_validated = true;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users u JOIN customer_data c ON u.user_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users JOIN customer_data ON users.user_id = customer_data.customer_id WHERE data_validated = true;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE users.username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '987e6543-a21b-34c5-d678-901234567890' AND role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS role_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(ur.role_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT name,email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id > 3 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id,name,email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;

SELECT role_name,permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_role_permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mappings.role_id;
SELECT * FROM role_permission_mappings WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mappings.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(role_id) AS role_count FROM users JOIN user_role_mappings ON users.user_id = user_role_mappings.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT user_roles.role_name, user_permissions.permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN role_permission_mappings ON user_roles.role_id = role_permission_mappings.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON role_permission_mappings.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
